column1: Funeral services for Mrs. Rice will be conducted 2:00 p.m. Tuesday at Edmaiston Mosley Funeral Home. Rev. Curtis W. Rice will officiate. Burial will follow in Howse Cemetery near Atwood
column2: Tn.  Visitation will be held at Edmaiston Mosley Funeral Home from 5:00 p.m. until 8:00 p.m. Monday and after 11:00 a.m. Tuesday.
